page.title: 04AMUSEMENTS,WITHERNSEA
page.content: As a holiday resort amusement arcades are an important feature of the town, especially in the area nearest the sea.There are 2 main areas of outdoor amusements and these largely take the form of rides e.g. inflated castle, ghost train swings,waltzers,kiddies train.Most are small-scale,simple and dated.There are also separate areas for crazy golf and remote control boats. The 3 indoor amusement arcades have been considerably developed and modernised,although many of the facilities are traditional with bingo, fruit machines and video games the most popular.One centre has tried to go up-market with bar and restaurant. Despite the apparently large number of separate arcades the amusements, both indoor and outdoor,are largely in the hands of 2 local businessmen.
